info.description:
This is a RESTful test server with API documentation for the Endeavour Common Interface Mechanism, which can be used to send requests to, and receive example responses.

NOTE: All dates should be provided in the standard ISO-8601 format (yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z')
info.title: Endeavour CIM Interop 2015

tags.name: administrative
tags.description: Operations on scheduling and ordering. Includes creation and management of appointments and workflow.

get.description:
Trace registered patients linked to a person

Examples:

https://endeavour-cim.cloudapp.net/CIM_war/v0.1/Person/$trace?identifier=NHS|6980086397

200.description: Returns a Single FHIR Person bundle, containing the person details and a number of ODS Patient details.

404.description: Not Found - resource type not supported, or not a FHIR end point

410.description: Gone - the resource has been deleted

get.description:
Trace registered patients linked to a person

Examples:

https://endeavour-cim.cloudapp.net/CIM_war/v0.1/Person/$trace?surname=Smith&dob=01/01/1980&gender=male

200.description: Returns a Single FHIR Person bundle, containing the person details and a number of ODS Patient details.

404.description: Not Found - resource type not supported, or not a FHIR end point

410.description: Gone - the resource has been deleted

parameters.name: odsCode
parameters.description: Organisational code that uniquely identifies the owner of the patient record

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Patient unique identifier. Any combination of upper or lower case ASCII letters ('A'..'Z', and 'a'..'z', numerals ('0'..'9'), '-' and '.', with a length limit of 64 characters. (This might be an integer, an un-prefixed OID, UUID or any other identifier pattern that meets these constraints.) regex: [A-Za-z0-9-.]{1,64}

200.description: Returns a Single FHIR Patient Resource - see schema at: http://hl7.org/fhir/2015May/patient.html

404.description: Not Found - resource type not supported, or not a FHIR end point

410.description: Gone - the resource has been deleted

get.description:
Get Patient Demographic Record By NHS Number

Examples:

https://endeavour-cim.cloudapp.net/CIM_war/v0.1/Z99999/Patient?identifier=NHS|6980086397

parameters.name: odsCode
parameters.description: Organisational code that uniquely identifies the owner of the patient record

200.description: Returns a FHIR Bundle of Patient Resource(s) - see schema at: http://hl7.org/fhir/2015May/patient.html

get.description:
Get Patient Demographic Records for All Patients

Examples:

https://endeavour-cim.cloudapp.net/CIM_war/v0.1/Z99999/Patient

parameters.name: odsCode
parameters.description: Organisational code that uniquely identifies the owner of the patient record

200.description: Returns a FHIR Bundle of Patient Resources - see schema at: http://hl7.org/fhir/2015May/patient.html

get.description:
Get Patient Demographic Records for All ACTIVE Patients

Examples:

https://endeavour-cim.cloudapp.net/CIM_war/v0.1/Z99999/Patient?active=true

parameters.name: odsCode
parameters.description: Organisational code that uniquely identifies the owner of the patient record

200.description: Returns a FHIR Bundle of Patient Resources - see schema at: http://hl7.org/fhir/2015May/patient.html

get.description:
Get Patient Demographic Records for All ACTIVE Patients that have had a record update since the date specified.

Examples:

https://endeavour-cim.cloudapp.net/CIM_war/v0.1/Z99999/Patient?_lastUpdated=>2015-05-20&active=true

parameters.name: odsCode
parameters.description: Organisational code that uniquely identifies the owner of the patient record

parameters.name: dateUpdated
parameters.description: Reference date after which the patient record was last updated

200.description: Returns a FHIR Bundle of Patient Resources - see schema at: http://hl7.org/fhir/2015May/patient.html

put.description:
The subscription resource is used to define a push based subscription from a server to another system. Once a subscription is registered with the server, the server checks every resource that is created or updated, and if the resource matches the given criteria, it sends a message on the defined 'channel' so that another system is able to take an appropriate action.

Examples:

https://endeavour-cim.cloudapp.net/CIM_war/v0.1/Z99999/Subscription/99d30432-33fe-4c93-84f9-92cc1961f417

parameters.name: odsCode
parameters.description: Organisational code that uniquely identifies the owner of the patient record

400.description: Bad request - resource could not be parsed or failed basic FHIR validation rules

404.description: Not found - resource type not supported, or not a FHIR end point

get.summary: Get Clinical Record By Patient ID
get.description:
This operation is used to return all the information related to the patient described in the resource on which this operation is invoked. Returns all resources that it has that are in the patient compartment for the identified patient, and any resource referenced from those, excluding binaries and attachments.

Examples:

https://endeavour-cim.cloudapp.net/CIM_war/v0.1/Z99999/Patient/1234/$everythingnobinary

parameters.name: odsCode
parameters.description: Organisational code that uniquely identifies the owner of the patient record

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Patient unique identifier. Any combination of upper or lower case ASCII letters ('A'..'Z', and 'a'..'z', numerals ('0'..'9'), '-' and '.', with a length limit of 64 characters. (This might be an integer, an un-prefixed OID, UUID or any other identifier pattern that meets these constraints.) regex: [A-Za-z0-9-.]{1,64}

200.description: Returns a FHIR Bundle of All Resources that are in the Patient Compartment for the identified patient. See FHIR specification at: http://hl7.org/fhir/2015May/patient-operations.html#everything

parameters.name: odsCode
parameters.description: Organisational code that uniquely identifies the owner of the patient record

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Document unique identifier. Any combination of upper or lower case ASCII letters ('A'..'Z', and 'a'..'z', numerals ('0'..'9'), '-' and '.', with a length limit of 64 characters. (This might be an integer, an un-prefixed OID, UUID or any other identifier pattern that meets these constraints.) regex: [A-Za-z0-9-.]{1,64}

200.description: Returns a Single FHIR Binary Resource - see schema at: http://hl7.org/fhir/2015May/binary.html

404.description: Not Found - resource type not supported, or not a FHIR end point

410.description: Gone - the resource has been deleted

get.summary: Get Medication Prescriptions By Patient ID
get.description:
Get Patient Medication Prescriptions By Patient ID

Examples:

https://endeavour-cim.cloudapp.net/CIM_war/v0.1/Z99999/Patient/1234/MedicationPrescription
https://endeavour-cim.cloudapp.net/CIM_war/v0.1/Z99999/Patient/1234/MedicationPrescription?datewritten=2015-04-01&datewritten=2015-05-30

parameters.description: Organisational code that uniquely identifies the owner of the patient record

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Patient unique identifier. Any combination of upper or lower case ASCII letters ('A'..'Z', and 'a'..'z', numerals ('0'..'9'), '-' and '.', with a length limit of 64 characters. (This might be an integer, an un-prefixed OID, UUID or any other identifier pattern that meets these constraints.) regex: [A-Za-z0-9-.]{1,64}

200.description: Returns a FHIR Bundle of MedicationPrescription Resources. See FHIR specification at: http://hl7.org/fhir/2015May/medicationprescription.html

parameters.description: Organisational code that uniquely identifies the owner of the patient record

parameters.name: patient
parameters.description: One of the individuals of the appointment is this patient

parameters.description: Date/Time that the appointment is to take place

200.description: Returns a FHIR Bundle of Appointment Resources. See FHIR specification at: http://hl7.org/fhir/2015May/appointment.html

get.description:
Get Available Appointment Schedules.

When checking availability for an appointment, first check what schedules are applicable, then check for available slots within these schedules.

Examples:

https://endeavour-cim.cloudapp.net/CIM_war/v0.1/Z99999/Schedule?date=2015-04-01&date=2015-05-30
https://endeavour-cim.cloudapp.net/CIM_war/v0.1/Z99999/Schedule?actor:Practitioner=G12345

parameters.name: odsCode
parameters.description: Organisational code that uniquely identifies the owner of the patient record

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Search for Schedule resources that have a period that contains this date specified

parameters.name: actor:Practitioner
parameters.description: The individual Practitioner to find a Schedule for

200.description: Returns a FHIR Bundle of Schedule Resources. See FHIR specification at: http://hl7.org/fhir/2015May/schedule.html

get.description:
Get slots of time on a schedule that may be available for booking appointments.

Examples:

https://endeavour-cim.cloudapp.net/CIM_war/v0.1/Z99999/Slot?schedule=1234&start=2015-06-01T00:00:00

parameters.name: odsCode
parameters.description: Organisational code that uniquely identifies the owner of the patient record

parameters.name: schedule
parameters.description: The Schedule Resource that we are seeking a slot within

200.description: Returns a FHIR Bundle of Slot Resources. See FHIR specification at: http://hl7.org/fhir/2015May/slot.html

post.summary: A Request To Book an Appointment Slot
post.description:
When the server accepts the order, it has only stored the order; there is no direct response to the order.

Examples:

https://endeavour-cim.cloudapp.net/CIM_war/v0.1/Z99999/Order

parameters.name: odsCode
parameters.description: Organisational code that uniquely identifies the owner of the patient record

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: FHIR Order Resource. See FHIR specification at: http://hl7.org/fhir/2015May/order.html

400.description: Bad request - resource could not be parsed or failed basic FHIR validation rules

404.description: Not found - resource type not supported, or not a FHIR end point
